code:
flowchart TD
    %% Entry
    A[Admin Dashboard] --> B{Select Action}

    %% Create Team Flow
    B -->|Create Team| C["Click Create Team"]
    C --> D[Fill Team Form]
    D --> E[Submit Team Data]
    E --> F[Backend API: Create Team]
    F --> G{Auth & Admin Role Valid?}
    G -->|No| H[Reject Request]
    G -->|Yes| I[Create Team in Database]
    I --> J[Return Success Response]
    J --> A

    %% Upload Document Flow
    B -->|Upload Documents| K[Select Team]
    K --> L[Select Files]
    L --> M[Upload to Backend]
    M --> N[Backend API: Upload Documents]
    N --> O{Auth & Team Permission Valid?}
    O -->|No| H
    O -->|Yes| P[Store Files in Team Storage]
    P --> Q[Index & Save Metadata in DB]
    Q --> R[Return Upload Success]
    R --> A

    %% Delete Document Flow
    B -->|Delete Documents| S[Select Team]
    S --> T[Select Documents]
    T --> U[Click Delete]
    U --> V[Backend API: Delete Documents]
    V --> W{Auth & Team Permission Valid?}
    W -->|No| H
    W -->|Yes| X{Document Exists in Team?}
    X -->|No| Y[Return Not Found Error]
    X -->|Yes| Z[Delete File & Metadata]
    Z --> AA[Return Delete Success]
    AA --> A
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
